description.displayText:
Hired this young lady and was having droughts about hiring her and she just surprised me with the amount of loving and respect and care she brought to my household and my family. Loved her so much that they considered her family and  was comfortable with her to a point where we took her with us when we were on vacation cause she was taking care of my mum too and unfortunately we lost our mum and she was so hurt and we had to move and she stayed.i gladly
Recommend her and would love to have taken her with us .

description.displayText: Helpful,respectful,liked What she was doing  and good with kids and loved  house work and did our laundry too and ironing and would love to keep her and help us.
